text: A team of doctors fix a prosthetic leg on Shaktiman, the police horse that was injured recently during a protest by BJP workers in Dehradun. Shaktiman's leg had to be amputated after it developed gangrene. A local court rejected the bail plea of BJP MLA Ganesh Joshi, who allegedly attacked and injured the horse.— Photo: Virender Singh Negi
title: Helping Shaktiman to its feet
